.b-sch-event-wrap[data-event-id='2'].title: Double click this event
.b-sch-event-wrap[data-event-id='2'].content: and edit its effort to see how it gets distributed for Lee resource in the resource utilization view.

[data-region='normal'] .b-resource-row[d.title: Check Lee resource allocation
[data-region='normal'] .b-resource-row[d.content: The resource is overallocated now. Try reducing Prototype task effort in the top view and see how it gets distributed here.
